title: Claude Journal: Remaining setup and content
design:
Multi-session work for the claude-journal blog:

DONE (Day 1):
- Blog skeleton with ultra-clean TIL format
- First post: Auditing the ~/.claude empire
- GitHub Pages deployment
- ~/.claude cleanup (debug logs, plugin cache)
- Conversation retention extended to 99999 days

REMAINING:
- Skills investigation: Read superpowers skills, assess fit with working style
- Conversation archive scripts (archive-conversations.sh, extract-conversations.py)
- Second post: Giving Claude eyes (looking skill)
- Third post: Auto-update hooks
- Config documentation for claude-config-public
- Public repo sync with redactions
